attributes.action: give back money that is taken from barking and dagenhams housing revenue account each year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many people in barking and dagenham are living in sub-standard housing,some of it seriously sub-standard, and there is not enough money to put it right if the money that is being that is being taken from the housing revenue account continues to be taken.
the average income per household in barking and dagenham is the lowest in london and the rent of the poorest people should not be taken in this way to subsidise better off areas whenthe housing repair and refurbishment need in barking and dagenham is so great

rejection.details: It is not clear what your petition is asking the PM to do.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
